nodes.title: Start of Morning
nodes.content: The sun streams through the window, warm on your face. It's the last week of summer break, and the air is thick with a lazy, bittersweet feeling. Your phone buzzes on the nightstand.

nodes.title: Check Phone
nodes.content: A text from your friend, Leo: 'Hey, you up? Beach day today, last chance before school starts. Be ready in an hour!' You groan but smile. A perfect way to start the end of summer.

nodes.title: Arrive at the Beach
nodes.content: The beach is packed. The sound of waves crashing and people laughing fills the air. You spot Leo waving you over to a spot near the old pier.

nodes.title: Alex Meets Jane Event
nodes.content: As you're setting down your towel, a stray frisbee sails through the air and lands right at your feet. A girl with bright, curious eyes runs up. 'Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry!' she says, laughing. 'I'm Jane.' This is the first time you've met.

nodes.title: Playing Volleyball
nodes.content: Jane invites you and Leo to join her friends for a game of volleyball. The afternoon passes in a blur of sun, sand, and friendly competition.

nodes.title: Bonfire on the Beach
nodes.content: As the sun sets, someone starts a bonfire. The group gathers around, sharing stories and roasting marshmallows. The stars begin to appear, scattered across the deep purple sky.
